text: Thomas Beverley Evans Jr. (born November 5, 1931) is an American lawyer and politician. He is a member of the Republican Party. He was a three term as U.S. Representative from Delaware from 1977 to 1983. ==Other websites== *Biographical Directory of the United States Congress *Delawareâ€™s Members of Congress *The Political Graveyard *Florida Coalition for Preservation *The Volatile Mix of Politics and Golf *Delaware Historical Society; website *University of Delaware; Library website * Category:1931 births Category:Living people Category:Lawyers from Delaware Category:United States representatives from Delaware Category:Politicians from Nashville, Tennessee Category:Politicians from Wilmington, Delaware Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Lawyers from Nashville, Tennessee
title: Thomas B. Evans Jr.
